overview: The opening scene has a precise date: January 30, 2005. 7:57 a.m., no less. Big hairy grizzly Ross Wilson wakes up in tattooed bush-bearded lover Clint Taylor's arms. They go for instant groping and kissing. Clint sucks and rims Ross before his seriously hirsute pal does the same to him. They trade oral, particularly rimming, with definitive lust.
title: Real Men 6: Daddy Chain
